ROOT.QUERY:
/***********************************************************************/ /* Query : Shipment blocked - Stores order cleared */ /***********************************************************************/
SELECT me3donord "Whs", me3numcde "PO #", me3codcli "Store", me3codexp "Shipper", me3cproin "Item code", me3sscc "SSCC", to_char(me3datexp,''MM/DD/RRRR HH12:MI'') "Shipping date", to_char(me3datliv,''MM/DD/RRRR HH12:MI'') "Delivery date", me3qteexp "Qty", ''Shipment is blocked, the store PO is cleared/archived - Contact CSO to reinject the customer order'' "Comment" FROM n3_mvtex@heinens_stk_prod WHERE me3qteexp > 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ccldetccl@heinens_custom_prod, artrac@heinens_custom_prod WHERE cclcexcde=me3numcde and artcinr=cclcinrc and me3cproin=artcexr) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hccldetccl@heinens_custom_prod, artrac@heinens_custom_prod WHERE cclcexcde=me3numcde and artcinr=cclcinrc and me3cproin=artcexr) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM alertlog, alerts where LALTID=ALTID AND ALTREALTIME=1 AND ALTID=''SHI0000000002'' AND LALTMESS LIKE ''%'' || me3sscc || ''%'')
ROOT.HEADER: Shipment blocked due to cleared store orders
